name: India
interesting_fact: India has the world's largest democracy.

name: Japan
interesting_fact: Japan has more than 5 million vending machines.

name: Brazil
interesting_fact: Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest in the world.

name: Egypt
interesting_fact: The Great Pyramid of Giza is the last surviving Ancient Wonder.

name: France
interesting_fact: France is the most visited country in the world.

name: Australia
interesting_fact: Australia has more kangaroos than people.

name: Canada
interesting_fact: Canada has the longest coastline in the world.

name: Mexico
main_festival: Día de los Muertos (Day of the Dead)
interesting_fact: Chocolate originated in Mexico with the ancient Aztecs.

name: South Africa
interesting_fact: South Africa is nicknamed the 'Rainbow Nation' for its cultural diversity.

name: Italy
interesting_fact: Italy has more UNESCO World Heritage sites than any other country.

name: China
interesting_fact: China has the world’s longest wall, stretching over 21,000 km.

name: United States
interesting_fact: The U.S. has the largest economy in the world.
